The Facebook post featuring the image of: 2. Commenters on the Facebook post expressed skepticism about the authenticity of the picture.
The National Weather Service spokesperso: Susan Buchanan, stated that the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) had not heard of a "tornabow" before.
Jeffrey Frame: a teaching assistant professor in the atmospheric sciences department at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, confirmed that the term "tornabow" is fake and stated that the picture itself has been digitally altered.
